title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item is not selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

EB: The item can be successfully selected on the second attempt.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
3. Verify that the item is not selected on the first attempt and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Try selecting the same item again and verify that it is now successfully selected.
